content: stay warm in style with this beginner-friendly crochet ear warmer pattern the timeless twist design looks chic while keeping your ears cozy and it s simple enough for new crocheters to enjoy whether you re making one for yourself a gift or to sell at craft fairs this ear warmer is a quick project you ll come back to again and again ✨ pattern features ✨five sizes included child = 3 x 16 small adult or teen = 4 x 18 medium adult = 5 x 20 large adult = 5 x 22 x-large adult = 5 x 24 ✨beginner friendly uses simple stitches and easy construction ✨two looks in one works beautifully in both solid and variegated yarns ✨quick to make perfect for last-minute gifts or market prep materials needed lion brand yarns landscapes #4 medium weight yarn for all sizes you will need 147 yards or less 1 skein of yarn colors shown cabana and mountain range size i crochet hook 5 5 mm tapestry needle scissors tape measure
